title: Runic Armor + Guardian Angel + Spirit Visage
body:
I know that Spirit Visage Passive increases the amount of life that GA gives you upon revival from 30% to 37.5%. 

Does the 8% increased healing from the "Runic Armor" Mastery also increase the amount of life that GA gives you? 

And if YES then does the "Runic Armor" mastery apply to "spirit visage" passive bonus as well?

replies.body: If we had sandbox we could test in literally like a minute. But we don't. All I can do is assume that they are both the exact same mechanically as that would make the most sense from a design standpoint. Not sure if its additive or multiplicative, or which takes priority.
